metadata.name: daily_check_in
metadata.description: HAiO program for daily check in

instructions.name: check_in
docs: The main instruction for daily check-in.
This uses `init_if_needed` to create or reuse a user account (PDA),
checks if the user has already checked in for the day, and emits an event on success.

accounts.name: user_check_in
docs: PDA storing the user's check-in status, created if it does not exist.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The user calling the instruction (payer for creation).

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program required for creating the PDA if needed.

errors.name: AlreadyCheckedInToday
errors.msg: You have already checked in today.

types.name: CheckInEvent
docs: Event emitted each time a user checks in successfully.

types.name: UserCheckInState
docs: State struct to store check-in data for each user.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority (user) who owns this check-in account.

fields.name: last_check_in_day
docs: The last UTC day the user checked in (days since 1970-01-01).
